mobs.long_desc: A large gremlin skulks around.
mobs.desc: This gremlin is very ugly and not making a sound,he is very strong looking and very sneaky.

mobs.long_desc: A fierce little gremlin wanders the hillside.
mobs.desc: He's not very large, perhaps hip-high to the average human, with mottled green skin and a thatch of brownish hair on his head. He has abnormally large and malevolent eyes, and large, pointed ears that stick out, catlike, at odd angles to his head. He lumbers around with an odd, creeping gait, snarling and growling.

mobs.long_desc: A tall, fierce gremlin captain stands here.
mobs.desc: He's tall, almost as tall as a human woman, with mottled brown-and green skin and an almost scaly appearance. His large, pointed ears are tufted at the ends, and these, with his large, malevolent eyes, give him the appearance of a very angry housecat. Hunched over slightly, he looks alert and ready.

mobs.long_desc: A brown hare lopes along, feeding.
mobs.desc: This rabbit-like creature is wilder and rangier than a normal rabbit, with long ears and an inquisitive demeanor. It looks very well fed, but scars on its ears and body indicate that it's seen some fighting.

mobs.long_desc: A scrawny fawn wanders the hills, looking for his mother.
mobs.desc: This young fawn is quite scrawny and weak, his spotted coat of fur marred with scratches. He has the very beginnings of antlers growing out of his head, but is still very small and young. He walks with an easy grace, stumbling only occasionally in his search.

mobs.long_desc: A graceful deer grazes here.
mobs.desc: This full-grown deer has a coat of rich, brownish-red hair and large, soft, soulful brown eyes. Her long, graceful legs end in cloven hooves, carrying her elegantly and easily wherever she wishes to go. She has no antlers, being female.

mobs.long_desc: A devious fox wanders through the area, hunting.
mobs.desc: This adult fox has a rich, glorious coat of reddish-brown fur, darkening to brown at the feet.  His ears and nose are also dark, forming a sort of mask across his face, while the tip of his tail is a tantalizing, pure white.  He is quite agile.

mobs.long_desc: A tenacious-looking bulldog scavenges for food.
mobs.desc: This medium-sized dog has a coat of beige-colored fur, very short and coarse. He looks very overweighted in the front, with massive front shoulders and a broad chest. His head is very large for his body size, and dominated by nature's most effective jaws. He doesn't appear aggressive, keeping his distance if allowed to.

mobs.long_desc: A young, pretty druidess watches the gate.
mobs.desc: She is young, with smooth, tanned skin and radiantly healthy auburn hair. Tall for a woman, she looks patient and wise, but still young enough to act like a girl.

mobs.long_desc: A gremlin crouches nearby, standing guard.
mobs.desc: This smallish humanoid has mottled green and brown skin and a scowling face that looks almost human. His long, pointed ears stick out from his head at haphazard angles, and his thatch of mud-colored hair defies all attempts at grooming. He's filthy, smells bad, and doesn't look to be in a good mood.

mobs.long_desc: An old gremlin warrior stands here, ready for battle.
mobs.desc: Although he appears to be quite old, he has large muscles and hard-set eyes that are unwavering. He is a typical gremlin, with mottled green-and- brown skin and pointed cat's-ears, but his thatch of hair is neatly braided down his back, and his muscles look impressive, for one who is not even hip-tall on a human.

mobs.long_desc: An armor-clad skeleton stands here, as if on display.
mobs.desc: This large skeleton looks human, and has been bare of flesh for many years. The bones are now yellowed and cracking. Oddly, the bones are still clad in the tatters and shreds of armor and clothes, with even a tabard present, though now in ruins and unable to be made out clearly.

mobs.long_desc: A large brown beaver is here, swimming through the water.
mobs.desc: This four-legged mammal is covered in thick, dense, oily brown fur, and has a flat, dark grey tail. When in the water, he is both graceful and pleasant to watch.

mobs.long_desc: An ancient poltergeist flings malign energies around.
mobs.desc: It's difficult to make out details about this misty grey shade. The energies it flings are both bright and dark, shades of white and blue, radiating out from it.

mobs.long_desc: A mangy, black-furred rat skitters past.
mobs.desc: It's very large, for a rat, with beady black eyes and mangy, ragged black fur. Its long, hairless tail twitches and lashes, and it shows its long, yellowed teeth frequently as it chitters and squeaks.

mobs.long_desc: A bright bird with long wings flies here.
mobs.desc: This bird is very big and its wings are very long and full of colorful feathers.  It seems to be looking for food.

mobs.long_desc: A shade wanders the halls, moaning.
mobs.desc: This ethereal being shows to the mortal eye as greyish mist with ragged edges, almost like a fluttering cloak. Where a man would have eyes, it has only two glowing spots, and it moans without a mouth or throat.

mobs.long_desc: A bullfrog sits here, croaking.
mobs.desc: This frog is large even by bullfrog standards. If left alone, he doesn't appear to care about what's going on around him, content to sit and croak. His skin is dark green, except for his throat, which is creamy white. He has occasional warts on his skin. When he croaks, his throat bulges out dramatically.

mobs.long_desc: A dwarven treasure-hunter pokes around here.
mobs.desc: This scruffy little dwarf is stout and strong, burly and muscular. He's seen hard times, as evidenced by the scars on his body and his general unkempt appearance. Even his beard is ratty. His eyes gleam with acquisitive eagerness.

mobs.keywords: dwarf dwarven treasure hunter treasure-hunter old
mobs.long_desc: An old dwarven treasure-hunter hobbles around here.
mobs.desc: This short, scruffy dwarf has seen many better days. His messy, unkempt beard is ragged and badly in need of brushing and trimming, and his skin is dirty and covered in scratches and scars. He is short, like all dwarves, but still retains some of his youthful muscles.

mobs.long_desc: A dwarven adventurer surveys his surroundings.
mobs.desc: This dwarf is short, like all his kind, but powerfully built, especially in his upper body. He has a neatly trimmed beard and braided hair, and his bright, dark eyes look inquisitive and keen.

mobs.long_desc: A zombie servant finishes its tasks.
mobs.desc: This macabre corpse is re-animated, but rotting where it stands. The funereal reek is quite powerful. The zombie is dressed in its traditional servants' clothes, though they are also moulding and rotting, and it seems to be going through the same tasks it did in life.

mobs.long_desc: A decaying butler waits here, trapped in endless service.
mobs.desc: He is very, very dead -- he reeks of rotting flesh and decay. His facial features are obliterated by rot, and the flesh is melting from his bones very gradually. Bones show through here and there. He doesn't appear to be distressed or angry, only waiting.

mobs.long_desc: An insane dwarf runs down the halls, screaming.
mobs.desc: This dwarf is small, like all his kind, and powerfully built. But he is massively unkempt, dirty, greasy, and ungroomed. His beard is falling out in patches, and his eyes glitter and glint with madness. He screams and howls, clambering in an effort to get away.

mobs.long_desc: A priest stands here in rags, mumbling incoherently.
mobs.desc: He's human, and still alive, but that's about all one could say for him. Clearly in the last throes of madness, he raves and gibbers, roaming around in rags and lurching from one horror to the next. His eyes glitter insanely.

mobs.long_desc: A juvenile green dragon hisses from atop a pile of treasure.
mobs.desc: This dragon is called a wyrmling because it is still in the first few years of its life.  It is a fearsome, scaled reptilian creature with a sinuous body and thin wings.  Its scales are a vivid emerald green color with darker green and black highlights.  It is smaller in size than its fully-grown adult counterpart, yet still possesses a powerful, muscular body that can move with surprising agility and speed.  Its eyes are a bright, piercing green, and its teeth and claws are sharp and deadly.  Overall, this wyrmling is a fearsome and dangerous creature, one that should not be underestimated by any hero foolish enough to cross its path!

objects.ground: An old looking silver necklace has been left here.

extras.text: This ancient-looking necklace is ornate, with a long, boxy silver chain set at the edges of a large, triangular chestpiece shaped like a rearing dragon. Dramatic, but dented, and very much in need of polishing.

objects.ground: An unfinished object is lying here.
A short wooden cane was left here on the ground.

extras.text: It is a wooden cane, just long enough to hold onto its bulbous end and use to aid in walking.  It's slightly dinged up from time and the elements, but it maintains its usefulness.

objects.ground: A shield with the tribal emblem of an orc clan lies on the floor.

extras.text: This hardened leather shield is stretched taut over a framework of wood, with straps in the back for one's arm.  The front is tooled and painted to look like a mouthful of gnashing teeth.

objects.ground: A tall, pointed, black-and-gold hat rests here.

extras.text: This tall, pointed, conical hat is made of black wool, stiffened until it stands straight up.  It is appliqued all over with bright golden stars.  The brim is round and not very wide.
Made of thin, supple leather, these leggings cover from waist to ankle, tying at the waist.
Made of supple, thin, brownish leather, these mottled sleeves cover from a vest's shoulderpieces to the wrists, lacing there for snugness.

objects.ground: A stream flows by the bank here.

extras.text: A small, swift-moving stream flows between its banks here.  A path leads right up to the bank, and it is obvious that many people consider it a drinking hole.

objects.ground: A bright red feather lies in the dust.

extras.text: It's a long wingfeather from the bright birds that live around Morgan Hill. It looks ideal for scribing spells into a spellbook.

objects.ground: A vest of bone plates, arranged like fish scales, lies here.

extras.text: The bones used to make this vest are somewhat flat, and wide.  They are arranged like fish-scales and pinned by bronze to a leather vest.  The vest covers from shoulders to hips, and can be removed or put on with ease.
This fire has died down slightly, to flickering, orange-red coals that sometimes pop. A circle of small stones surrounds the fire, with room for sitting down around its outside.

objects.ground: A shiny onyx and silver bracelet lies here.

extras.text: This silver bracelet is heavy and solid, with a clasp that unhinges to get it on and off the wrist.  It is chased all 'round in onyx, a thick black shiny stream of it, so that only the very edges of the silver backing are visible at its top and bottom edges, encircling it.

objects.ground: A dirty leather sack sits here, leaking a tangy liquid.

extras.text: The leather skin is stained from the spills of many liquors, and emits a strong odor that stings the nostrils.

objects.ground: A ring made of tiny branches and leaves lies here.

extras.text: The ring is made of tiny, slender branches, still living, their equally tiny green leaves forming a wreath.

objects.ground: An oak chest rests here, its cover dusty.
objects.action_desc: This chest has been here for a long time and is very dusty.

objects.ground: A shiny silver ring is set about with leaf-shaped amethysts.

extras.text: This shiny silver ring is slender enough for a woman to wear, but not excessively feminine in shape.  It is set all around with amethyst cabuchons, unfaceted and round-faced, set into silver edgings that are raised slightly to show off the purple jewels.
Made with a steel backing, this drop earring has a peridot pendant. The pale green stone is faceted to catch the light.

triggers.name: Gremlin_pleeb_follow
triggers.commands: * This trigger was supposed to make the gremlin * follow and group with his leader.  I think * perhaps this should be a special proc and * not a trigger.  These notes are from copying * the Mob progs to script format. scratch

triggers.name: gremlin_sarg_group
triggers.commands: * * This was a prog that was to make this mobile * group his followers after they followed and * consented to him.  It was messed up and didn't * work.  Perhaps this should be compiled as a * spec proc.  These notes exist for clarity of * zone development in the future. * growl

triggers.name: east-blessing
triggers.argument_list: I pray for a blessing from mother earth, creator of life and bringer of death
triggers.commands: wecho The &9&bstone monoliths&0 begin to &6&bglow&0 with power. wait 4s wload obj 2330 wecho The &6&bpower&0 seems to coalesce into a &7&bshining ball&0. wait 20s wpurge wecho The &7&bshining ball&0 dissapates back into nothingness. wecho The &9&bstones&0 stop glowing.

rooms.name: On the Trail to Morgan Hill
rooms.description: The path leads south, up into the lightly wooded area called Morgan Hill. The trail appears well travelled, and birds can be heard chirping all along the way.  Several large trees stand out, but otherwise the terrain is mostly high grasses.  To the north is a gated fence, and to the south the trail continues toward the hill.

rooms.name: On the Trail to Morgan Hill
rooms.description: The path leads away from the farmlands heading south, up into the lightly wooded area called Morgan Hill.  The trail appears well travelled, and birds can be heard chirping all along the way.  Several large trees stand out, but otherwise the terrain is mostly high grasses.  The trail continues toward the north, and to the south up the hill.

rooms.name: At the Foot of Morgan Hill
rooms.description: You stand at the base of a tall hill, reknown for having monsters and ghosts all around.  The tall grasses grow to about four feet here, and there are a few scattered trees about.  The hill grades lightly upward to about 200 feet above you.  The narrow trail continues up the hill to the east.

East.description: Up the Hill.

rooms.name: Up the Hill
rooms.description: Tall grass grows all over the lower side of the hill, gradually giving way to a light wood toward the top.  You can see birds of all types flying about, singing their wild songs of love.  Occassionally, you notice a rabbit or squirrel peering at you with beady eyes.  The trail grows faint here, but the grass is easily navigated without a trail.

rooms.name: Up the Hill
rooms.description: Tall grass grows all over the lower side of the hill, gradually giving way to a light wood toward the top.  You can see birds of all types flying about, singing their wild songs of love.  Ocassionally, you notice a rabbit or squirrel peering at you with beady eyes.  The trail grows faint here, but the grass is easily navigated without a trail.

rooms.name: On Top of Morgan Hill
rooms.description: You are on top of a large hill, about 300 feet in elevation above the surrounding countryside.  While the terrain is mostly grassy, there are trees sparsely scattered about also.  The hilltop seems alive with life, with birds chirping, and small animals running to and fro.  The shimmer of water can be seen to the east, while down the hill is a small trail leading toward the west. The grasses here are varied, but mostly above the waist in height.  Several trees stand in a clump far to the east, where the hill climbs yet higher.

East.description: to the east you see Morgan Hill.

rooms.name: On a Stream
rooms.description: The stream flows gently down the hill toward the west.  The clear blue water is around ten feet deep, and the stream is about twenty feet wide.  Small fish can be seen swimming along in the stream, chasing one another about its depths. Different types of water plants grow along the bottom of the clear stream, nurtured by the warm rays of the sun.

South.description: You see a campfire and a couple of temporary structures.

rooms.name: On Top of Morgan Hill
rooms.description: You are on top of a large hill, about 300 feet in elevation above the surrounding countryside.  While the terrain is mostly grassy, there are trees sparsely scattered about also.  The hilltop seems aliv with life, with birds chirping, and small animals running to and fro.  The shimmer of water can be seen to the east, while down the hill is a small trail leading toward the west. The grasses here are varied, but mostly above the waist in height.  Several trees stand in a clump far to the east, where the hill climbs yet higher. A stream flows to the south. The trail continues on to the east and west.

North.description: The ruins of a building are visible to the north.

East.description: to the east you see Morgan Hill.

South.description: You see a flowing blue stream of water.

West.description: to the west you see Morgan Hill.

rooms.name: On Top of Morgan Hill
rooms.description: You are on top of a large hill, about 300 feet in elevation above the surrounding countryside.  While the terrain is mostly grassy, there are trees sparsely scattered about also.  The hilltop seems aliv with life, with birds chirping, and small animals running to and fro.  The shimmer of water can be seen to the east, while down the hill is a small trail leading toward the west. The grasses here are varied, but mostly above the waist in height.  Several trees stand in a clump far to the east, where the hill climbs yet higher.

East.description: On top of Morgan HIll.

rooms.name: On Top of Morgan Hill
rooms.description: You are on top of a large hill, about 300 feet in elevation above the surrounding countryside.  While the terrain is mostly grassy, there are trees sparsely scattered about also.  The hilltop seems aliv with life, with birds chirping, and small animals running to and fro.  The shimmer of water can be seen to the east, while down the hill is a small trail leading toward the west. The grasses here are varied, but mostly above the waist in height.  Several trees stand in a clump far to the east, where the hill climbs yet higher. A trail leads south, to an encampment.

South.description: A camp is visible to the south.

rooms.name: An Adventurer's Camp
rooms.description: Alongside the small stream running down the hill is the adventurers campground, where many a hardy adventurer has spent the night, resting between journeys.  As always, there is a group here resting and healing from the perils of an adventurers life.  In particular, there is a small green tent to the west of you, and to the east lies a grey tent made from what you think to be stone giant hides.  A large campfire still smolders just south of you.

North.description: A shimmering blue stream flows along the hillside.

East.description: A large grey tent of giant hides.

rooms.name: Inside the Grey Tent
rooms.description: The tent itself is fashioned from the hides of at least ten stone giants, and inside it is quite huge.  Spanning some 25 feet to the east and north, and some 12 feet high in the middle, the tent could sleep nearly twenty human-sized individuals.  However, the tent seems to be partitioned off to form three seperate areas, each with a single cot.  Each cot is adorned with a large cave bear skin, and has a goose-feather pillow.  Also, there are small tables and chairs inside each small area inside the tent.  You can hear no sound from outside of the tent, and the odor is quite pleasant inside as well.

rooms.name: An Adventurer's Camp
rooms.description: Alongside the small stream running down the hill is the adventurers campground, where many a hardy adventurer has spent the night, resting between journeys.  As always, there is a group here resting and healing from the perils of an adventurers life.  In particular, there is a small green tent to the west of you, and to the east lies a grey tent made from what you think to be stone giant hides.  A large campfire still smolders just south of you.

South.description: The south end of the camp.

rooms.name: An Adventurer's Camp
rooms.description: Alongside the small stream running down the hill is the adventurers campground, where many a hardy adventurer has spent the night, resting between journeys.  As always, there is a group here resting and healing from the perils of an adventurers life.  In particular, there is a small green tent to the west of you, and to the east lies a grey tent made from what you think to be stone giant hides.  A large campfire still smolders just south of you.

East.description: An adventurers camp.

rooms.name: An Adventurer's Camp
rooms.description: Alongside the small stream running down the hill is the adventurers campground, where many a hardy adventurer has spent the night, resting between journeys.  As always, there is a group here resting and healing from the perils of an adventurers life.  In particular, there is a small green tent to the west of you, and to the east lies a grey tent made from what you think to be stone giant hides.  A large campfire still smolders just south of you.

rooms.name: Inside a Small Green Tent
rooms.description: The tent is made of a light canvas material, while very light to carry, it probably leaks large amounts of water in rainy weather.  The inside is in shambles,litter everywhere.  A small shabby blanket crumpled into a ball,and a pile of food including some scraps of burnt meat lay on the floor here.  The whole place reeks like a city dump and it is also very warm and stuffy in the tent. The tentflap is open to the east.

East.description: An adventurers camp.

rooms.name: A Patch of Trees
rooms.description: Mostly deciduous trees grow in this little patch, most of them fairly young, and very few in good health. The ground is hard-packed, with little grass visible. They grow unevenly in a strip along the trail. A building is barely visible past them, but to the east an outcropping of rock makes passage impossible. The trail is visible to the west.

South.description: There are more trees to the south.

West.description: The trail is visible to the east.

rooms.name: A Patch of Trees
rooms.description: Mostly deciduous trees grow in this little patch, most of them fairly young, and very few in good health. The ground is hard-packed, with little grass visible. They grow unevenly in a strip along the trail. A building is barely visible past them, but to the east an outcropping of rock makes passage impossible. The trail is visible to the west.

North.description: More trees grow to the south.

South.description: More trees grow to the south.

West.description: The trail is visible to the west.

rooms.name: A Patch of Trees
rooms.description: Mostly deciduous trees grow in this little patch, most of them fairly young, and very few in good health. The ground is hard-packed, with little grass visible. They grow unevenly in a strip along the trail. A building is barely visible past them, but to the east an outcropping of rock makes passage impossible. The trail is visible to the west.

North.description: More trees grow to the north.

West.description: The path is visible to the west.

rooms.name: An Ancient Apiary
rooms.description: This field of flowers grows around the ruins of what appear to be very old wooden apiaries -- beehives made by man. Most of the apiaries are in sad disrepair, but the few that look usable are still buzzing with bees, at least by day. Shrubs and grasses grow up to the south, making progress difficult. A ruins can be seen to the west.

West.description: A ruins is visible to the west.

rooms.name: The Ruins of a House
rooms.description: The skeletal remains of what was once a wooden building stand here, in the middle of a grassy knoll. There is little of interest now, it having obviously been picked over by treasure hunters. Boards and rotting bricks lie in heaps, some still charred by fire. A trail leads south.

East.description: Some apiaries stand to the east.

South.description: The hilltop trail is visible to the south.

rooms.name: A Gremlin Camp
rooms.description: This messy campground looks like it's been lived in for some time. The grass is stamped down and dead, with shrubs and plants growing only on its periphery. Campfires ringed with rocks stand here and there, and some makeshift huts made of rotten wood stand around. It stinks of decay and unwashed bodies. A trail leads north, to the hilltop.

North.description: The trail leads north, to a hilltop.

East.description: A pit is visible to the east, with a trail leading up to it. It's fairly safe-looking.

rooms.name: A Bone Pit
rooms.description: No plants grow around this charnel pit. It reeks of decay and death, and is deep enough to make it difficult to walk around. Inside the earthen pit are years' worth of bones, some fresh, some yellowed. Insects buzz unwholesomely around the pit, and crawl around inside it. Most of the bones look humanoid, but there are some animal bones here and there. A trail leads back to the encampment.

West.description: A trail leads west, to the encampment.

rooms.name: A Trail Along Morgan Hill
rooms.description: The trail leads north and south along the crest of the hill.  To the north is a flattened area that seems to be in use as a campground.  To the south the trail continues along the hill.  Through some trees to the east you can see some sort of wooden structure, probably an old house.  The air is still, and a myriad of sounds can be heard from atop the hill. The path leads north and south.

East.description: Some trees are visible to the east.

rooms.name: A Trail Along Morgan Hill
rooms.description: The trail leads north and south along the crest of the hill.  To the north is a flattened area that seems to be in use as a campground.  To the south the trail continues along the hill.  Through some trees to the east you can see some sort of wooden structure, probably an old house.  The air is still, and a myriad of sounds can be heard from atop the hill. The trail extends to the north and south.

East.description: Some trees are visible to the east.

rooms.name: A Trail Along Morgan Hill
rooms.description: The trail leads north and south along the crest of the hill.  To the north is a flattened area that seems to be in use as a campground.  To the south the trail continues along the hill.  Through some trees to the east you can see some sort of wooden structure, probably an old house.  The air is still, and a myriad of sounds can be heard from atop the hill. The trail continues to the north and west.

North.description: A trail along the top of Morgan Hill.

East.description: Trees grow to the east.

rooms.name: A Trail Along Morgan Hill
rooms.description: The trail leads north and south along the crest of the hill.  To the north is a flattened area that seems to be in use as a campground.  To the south the trail continues along the hill.  Through some trees to the east you can see some sort of wooden structure, probably an old house.  The air is still, and a myriad of sounds can be heard from atop the hill.

East.description: A trail along the top of morgan Hill.

rooms.name: A Trail Along Morgan Hill
rooms.description: The trail leads north and south along the crest of the hill.  To the north is a flattened area that seems to be in use as a campground.  To the south the trail continues along the hill.  Through some trees to the east you can see some sort of wooden structure, probably an old house.  The air is still, and a myriad of sounds can be heard from atop the hill.

East.description: A trail along the top of morgan Hill.

South.description: A trail along the top of Morgan Hill.

rooms.name: A Trail Along Morgan Hill
rooms.description: The trail leads north and south along the crest of the hill.  To the north is a flattened area that seems to be in use as a campground.  To the south the trail continues along the hill.  Through some trees to the east you can see some sort of wooden structure, probably an old house.  The air is still, and a myriad of sounds can be heard from atop the hill. The trail bends here, heading north and west.

East.description: A stream flows down the hillside.

rooms.name: A Clump of Trees
rooms.description: The path ends here, in a clump of trees, with no obvious means of egress except the way you came.  To the east you see that the trail continues across the stream, and into a slightly more wooded area of the hillside.  Birds can be seen flying through the air all around, and their chirping is a very pleasant sound.

East.description: A trail on Morgan Hill.

rooms.name: On a Gentle Stream
rooms.description: The stream flows gently southward, down the hillside, in a winding pathway between the small knolls and trees.  The shallow water is very clear, and you can easily see the bottom.  Large rocks lie along the bottom of the streambed, in a random pattern that is so subtle that it is almost beautiful.  Small fish can be seen darting back and forth in the streams waters.

East.description: A small cobblestone footpath.

West.description: A trail along the top of Morgan Hill.

rooms.name: On a Cobblestone Footpath
rooms.description: The small smooth stones show years of wear as they lay in neat, concise patterns along the path.  The path leads eastward, through a small wrought iron gate, and up the hill to a large house.  The gate runs all the way around the sides of the house, and is about eight feet high.  The gate is not closed, and due to the obvious corrosion, it appears that is may be a chore to force it open or closed from its current position.

East.description: The front door of the house.

rooms.name: The Mansion Foyer
rooms.description: &7&0You find yourself in the foyer of a large house.  The front door squeeks as a slight breeze blows through the room.  Ornate tapestries line the walls, years of dust fill the room,and lack of being cleaned.  The wooden floor creaks as you take each step across the room.  The high vaulted ceiling is adorned with a hanging chandelier that has various sizes of small &7candles&0 still hanging in it.  To the south you can see what appears to be the main dining hall. Directly to the north of you seem to be someone's living quarters.

East.description: The Landing of A Fancy Spiral Staircase.

South.description: The dining hall and kitchen areas.

rooms.name: Run-Down Servants' Quarters
rooms.description: &7 &0The room once served as the living quarters for the household servants. Most likely there was a woman in the room, since what few pieces of furniture still remain are evidently of female taste.  The room is somewhat small, but there is a nice little picture window on the north wall, from which you can see out onto the hillside.  The place has a musty odor, telling you that not many people have been here in some time.

rooms.name: A Once-Grand Dining Hall
rooms.description: &7 &0The dining hall must have been very elegant at one time in the past, however, now it is musty and dusty.  The table is showing signs of rot, and some fungus has taken over one of its legs.  The high backed chairs are covered in a thick layer of dust, and the table center-piece is a cracked ceramic pot that probably once held a flower or plant.  The area to the south must have been where the kitchen once stood, but now however, it is nothing more than a pile of rubble. There is an archway leading north, out of the hall.

rooms.name: The Landing of a Spiral Staircase
rooms.description: &7 &0The stairs climb into the second story of the house.  The handrails seem sturdy, however they are pitted and show obvious signs of rot.  The stairs themselves appear to be in pretty good shape, as if someone or something has maintained them over the years.  The room is nothing more really than an extension from the main entry and foyer.  The same wall coverings can be seen here, as well as the characteristic high vaulted ceilings.

rooms.name: At the Top of the Spiral Staircase
rooms.description: You are at the top of the staircase in the old mansion on Morgan Hill.  The stairs lead down to the main entrance to the mansion, and further down from there to the cellar.  The handrails seem sturdy, as do the steps themselves. A gentle creak comes up from the staircase as the wind blows outside. A hallway leads off to the north, and guest chambers stand to the east and south. The staircase leads back downstairs.

East.description: A Guest bedroom.

rooms.name: A Guest Bedroom
rooms.description: &7 &0The room is musty and cluttered with odds and ends of furniture, perhaps stored here from other parts of the house.  There are several holes in the floor here, making it somewhat unsafe to walk across.  A large round window looks over the front yard of the house on the west wall. A doorway leads north, but the door is missing.

North.description: The landing of the spiral stairs.

rooms.name: A Guest Room
rooms.description: &7 &0The room has probably closed up for some time, and smells rather foul. The window has been overgrown from the outside by some sort of ivy, making the room appear even darker than the rest of the house.  The room is sparsely furnished, with only a small bed and a nightstand. Both of these are moulding and rotted through time, covered with a thick layer of dust. A doorway leads west, but it is missing its door.

West.description: The landing of the spiral staircase.

rooms.name: A Narrow Hallway
rooms.description: &7 &0To the north appears to be the master bedroom, while to the east and west are the bedrooms of lesser family members.  The hall leads south to the staircase, and north, directly into the master bedroom.  The walls have a few holes in them, but other than that the hallway is rather clean.  The floor hardly makes a sound as you walk across its old wooden planks.

East.description: A Small Room in the Haunted Mansion

South.description: At the top of the spiral stairs.

rooms.name: The Master Bedroom
rooms.description: A large bed dominates the eastern side of the room, with a purple canopy of silk draped over its top.  The wood from which the bedframe was fashioned has stood the test of time remarkably well, and shows little evidence of rot or the growth of fungus.  The fabric that holds the bed together is likewise in good condition.  The large wardrobe along the north wall seems less fortunate, as the door has rotted off of its hinges.  There is a small wash basin, which has long since been dry, and the small hand towel beside it is nearly rotted into nothingness.  The rounded ceiling has a small mural painted at the top, of lovers dancing in the moonlight.

rooms.name: A Small Room
rooms.description: &7 &0The room is small, only about 8 feet long by 10 feet wide.  A small pile of what were once furs lay in the floor along the south wall, as if they were used as a bed.  There are no other furnishings in the place, and the window has been boarded over with thick wooden planks.  The room smells quite foul.

rooms.name: A Cluttered Bedroom
rooms.description: &7 &0Piles&0 of boxes and crates are stacked about the small bedroom.  The bed is nearly hidden beneath a pile of skins that were thoughtlessly tossed there. The window of the room is wide open, in fact, there is no glass in the window. Cobwebs fill the corners of the room, and dust covers the floor, along with leaves from the outside.  There is some writing on the wall just to the left of the doorway.

East.description: A private hallway.

rooms.name: A Cellar
rooms.description: The cellar is dark and smelly, almost as if the place were a sewer.  Small baskets of rotten fruits and vegetables are stored here, as well as some moldy bread.  The walls of the cellar are cut from the earth itself, with wooden planks as reinforcement.  There is a single door on the south wall. The staircase leads back upstairs.

East.description: A pile of rocks has been carefully arranged to blend in with the foundation of the house.

rooms.name: A Storage Room
rooms.description: &7 &0The room must have some vent to the surface, for the air is much easier to breath here than in the main cellar.  Neat, tidy shelves line the walls in this small chamber.  Each shelf has a differnt type of food or container stacked neatly upon it.  A small box lays on the floor under a shelf on the south wall.

North.description: The cellar of the mansion on Morgan Hill.

extras.text: The box is open, and contains nothing at all!

rooms.name: A Cavernous Lair
rooms.description: Deep beneath the rolling green of Morgan Hill lies the lair of a juvenile dragon.  The entrance to the lair is concealed by a pile of rocks and shrubs, carefully arranged to blend in with the foundation of the house.  The lair is a small cavern with a low ceiling at the end of a narrow passage which winds through the earth.  The walls are rough and uneven, with jagged rocks jutting out at odd angles.  The air is cool and damp, with the faint smell of earth and sulfur.  In the center of the chamber is a tiny pile of treasure of coins, sparkling gems, and odd bits and bobs the wyrmling has collected over its short life.

West.description: A pile of rocks has been carefully arranged to blend in with the foundation of the house.
